description: This file defines a 'Results' component for a quiz application frontend, responsible for displaying quiz results, handling routing to restart or go back, and managing state related to quiz scores.

classes.name: Results
classes.description: A Lightning.js component displaying quiz results with score, message, and restart/back controls.

methods.name: scoreText
methods.description: Computes the display string for the score, e.g., 'Score: 8 / 10'.

methods.name: messageText
methods.description: Generates a message based on the performance ratio, such as 'Great job!'.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes score and total from URL query parameters or localStorage.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Handles 'Enter' key input to restart the quiz.

methods.name: back
methods.description: Handles 'Back' key input to navigate to the intro screen.
